mapper.select: SELECT s.schedule_id, s.name, sc.category_name, sc.color, TO_CHAR(s.vote_deadline, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS voteDeadline, s.is_group FROM member_schedule ms JOIN schedule s ON ms.schedule_id = s.schedule_id JOIN schedule_category sc ON s.schedule_category_id = sc.schedule_category_id LEFT JOIN schedule_place sp ON s.schedule_id = sp.schedule_id WHERE ms.email = #{email} AND s.is_group = 1 AND sp.schedule_id IS NULL ORDER BY s.vote_deadline ASC
